item.content:encoded:
[quote]Message from Authority2:
Limits refunds 100% the amount of extra Spiral it lets you bring along, but still only 50% for the 100. This fits the information you gave in the wiki - if you had Limits 1 and ended with 101, 50 is refunded plus half of the remaining 52, giving 76.
If you brought along 250 Spiral using Limits 3 and you spent 100 or more, that means that you'd have less than 150 left so it would refund everything, but if you'd ended with over 150 then the remaining Spiral would still be cut in half.
If you have further concerns, let's discuss them in the Dicussion page on the Guide.[/quote]

Yea, I have concerns, namely you are telling people to not get limits because it doesn't refund their energy, which is lies and a bad advice.
1. It explicitly states that it refunds the energy
2. I tested it and observed it refunds the energy.

Now, I was unaware of the exact amounts being refunded (thank you for clarifying it), but in that case you should have corrected it instead of just reverting the edit, which is:
A. Lazy
B. Changes 1 slightly inaccurate statement (saying it always gives back 100%, instead of just during the most typical play scenario) into a blatantly false statement (saying it never gives back any additional spiral).

Also, you should have posted your argument in this discussion page to begin with instead of pming me.

PS. I tested and on finishing with 216 I got back 183 which confirms your math. I am going to edit the page from its current blatantly false state to the corrected formulas that you yourself provided (not back to the erroneous statement I myself made before and which you reverted)
